document.title: Announcing the Guitar Tune Of The Day Weblog
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
I must admit it, I am a guitarist. Not a good one, but I like playing the instrument, and listening to good guitar players. So Ive just opened a little blog, the Guitar Tune Of The Day blog which aims to present a song I like, every day if I can.
Oh, and happy end of year people.
